3.7.18  11:02 pm   Bill. In the Notebook, linked on the front page, I see no new notes; All notes are currently colored in the way that indicates that I have clicked on the note, and I have not clicked on any notes in the recent weeks (recent, to be clear, being 4 weeks), so I know you have not posted a new (not-yet-clicked-on) note in weeks. Yet you claim you are have posted new notes in the recent weeks in a publically viewable manner. Do you agree that you have made these claims? Do you still agree with these claims? And if you do, why is it that, as of this point, on my screen, and presumably on the screens of other viewers, there are no new (posted within the past 4 weeks) notes?
